code: import{roundAndPluralize}from'./roundAndPluralize';export function timeSince(date,min){var seconds=Math.floor((new Date().getTime()-date.getTime())/1000);var interval=seconds/31536000;if(interval>1)return roundAndPluralize(interval,min?'yr':'year');interval=seconds/2592000;if(interval>1)return roundAndPluralize(interval,min?'mth':'month');interval=seconds/86400;if(interval>1)return roundAndPluralize(interval,'day');interval=seconds/3600;if(interval>1)return roundAndPluralize(interval,min?'hr':'hour');interval=seconds/60;if(interval>1)return roundAndPluralize(interval,'min');return roundAndPluralize(interval,'sec');}var MINUTE=1000*60;var HOUR=MINUTE*60;var DAY=24*HOUR;export var timeLeft=function timeLeft(targetDate){var countDown=new Date(targetDate).getTime()-new Date().getTime();var days=Math.floor(countDown/DAY);var hours=Math.floor(countDown%DAY/HOUR);var minutes=Math.floor(countDown%HOUR/MINUTE);return"".concat(days!==0?roundAndPluralize(days,'day'):''," ").concat(hours!==0?roundAndPluralize(hours,'hour'):''," ").concat(roundAndPluralize(minutes,'minute'));};
